name: searching_by_keyword_apple_should_display_the_corresponding_article

testSteps.description: Should see definition: A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.

title: Searching by keyword apple should display the corresponding article

testFailureCause.message: Could not instantiate new webdriver instance of type class org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver (The path to the chromedriver driver executable must be set by the webdriver.chrome.driver system property; for more information, see https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads. The latest version can be downloaded from https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads
